sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词含有"黎明，黄昏"之意。
means: twilight ： 指日落后或日出前的微明，但通常侧重于前者。
dawn ： 指天刚亮时的黎明，可作引申用。
dusk ： 指接近夜晚的黄昏时刻。

sentence.Network_en: The lighthouse beam was quite distinct in the gathering dusk.
sentence.Network_cn: 灯塔的光束在渐浓的暮色中清晰可见。

sentence.Network_en: Dusk was deepening as they drove back to the lights of Shillingham.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们驱车返回华灯初上的希灵汉姆时，暮色渐浓。

sentence.Network_en: As the dusk shaded into night, we drove slowly through narrow alleys.
sentence.Network_cn: 夜幕渐渐降临，我们驱车在狭窄的胡同里缓慢前行。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 黄字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 黄化〖 yellowing〗 黄昏〖 evenfall;dusk〗 黄巾起义〖 theYellowTurbansUprising〗.
玄瞑是什么?_百度知道 ... [close the eyes] 闭上眼睛,多指人死时无所牵挂 [dusk] 黄昏时的天色;暮色 [night job] 夜工.
普特英语听力_百度文库 ... duration n. 持续，持续期间 dusk n. 黄昏，薄暮 deliberately adv. 故意的.
(D-F)英语四级词汇表下载 ... during prep. 在…期间 dusk n. 薄暮，黄昏，幽暗 dust n. 尘土，灰尘.

list.abs: 2013年8月16日 - 电视台援引总统府声明说,埃及从14日开始进入紧急状态(state of emergency),为期一个月;同时在开罗和其他几个城市实行彻夜宵禁(dusk-to-dawn curfew).
翻成暮门堡不知是否适当我是拆成dusk-endale据网上查来的资料~endale似乎是enter-dale的简写
高一英语必修1单词_百度知道 ... dusk 黄昏 at dusk 在黄昏 thunder 打雷.
词组短语大全 - 豆丁网 ... at dawn 黎明时 at dusk 黄昏时, 傍黑儿, 傍晚 at ease 自然, 自在, 塌实, 踏实, 舒坦, 安逸.
《高中英语语法大全》 ... The winter is coming. 冬天要来了。(暗示寒冷) from dawn till dusk 从早到晚 Night fell. 天黑了。.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English dox 'dark, swarthy' and doxian 'darken in colour', of Germanic origin; related to Old High German tusin 'darkish'; compare with dun. The noun dates from the early 17th cent. The change in form from -x to -sk occurred in Middle English

entry.def: Dusk is the time just before night when the daylight has almost gone but when it is not completely dark.
The dusk is the dull, shadowy light there is at dusk.

example.ex: She turned and disappeared into the dusk.

means.word_mean: 1. the time of day immediately following sunset;

sentences.sentence: "they finished before the fall of night"

auth_sentence.content: Yelwa village is under a dusk to dawn curfew.
auth_sentence.res_content: Yelwa village is under a dusk to dawn curfew.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Yelwa village is under a dusk to dawn curfew.

auth_sentence.content: We could smoke fags by the Seine at dusk.
auth_sentence.res_content: We could smoke fags by the Seine at dusk.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We could smoke fags by the Seine at dusk.

auth_sentence.content: After dusk you could get outside the city limits.
auth_sentence.res_content: After dusk you could get outside the city limits.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: After dusk you could get outside the city limits.

sentences.en: The street lights come on at dusk and go off at dawn.
sentences.cn: 路灯在黄昏时开, 拂晓时关。

sentences.en: Dusk turns the window into a mirror.
sentences.cn: 暮色把窗玻璃变成一面镜子。

jushi.english: The street lights come on at dusk.
One cannot see very far in the dusk.
jushi.chinese: 在暮色中,一个人无法看得很远。

jushi.english: I saw nothing in the dusk of the hall.
jushi.chinese: 大厅里一片昏暗,看不清楚。
